pageContext.claim: “Last month, 20,000 minors were illegally smuggled into the United States.”
pageContext.analysis: According to DHS, the December total for border apprehensions of unaccompanied children and those with family members was 19,313. But it’s wrong to describe it as a statistic that represents children being smuggled into the country. Border officials screen for false claims of parentage. To imply as Trump does that a child’s mother, father or legal guardian is or hired a smuggler, coyote or gang member in all of these cases is wrong.
